posts.title: Beauty Bash is September 11th
posts.postTitle: Beauty Bash: Now with Cherry Payment Options!
posts.postDesc: Celebrate September 11th at Birdies with RELUXE Med Spa—and take advantage of Cherry’s flexible payment plans on the spot.
posts.postAdditionalDesc: Enjoy live demos, mini-treatments, and unlock easy financing through Cherry for your favorite services: injectables, lasers, facials, and more.
posts.singlePostDesc: Discover Cherry at Beauty Bash: split your spa investment into manageable payments and indulge in top-tier treatments without breaking the bank.
posts.blockquoteText: “Pamper yourself today—pay your way with Cherry.”
posts.postExcerpt: Join us September 11th and say yes to beauty with Cherry financing available on all event purchases.
